sent.orig: JiangYue Hotel is a three-star hotel, management by the Guangzhou Pearl River Property Hotel Management Co.
sent.trans: 江悦酒店是由广州珠江物业酒店管理公司管理的三星级酒店。

sent.orig: The current supply of five-star hotels as Xiamen Yuehua Hotel, Marco Polo Hotel and the hotel.
sent.trans: 现今供应厦门五星级酒店如悦华大酒店、马哥孛罗大酒店以及各星级酒店。

sent.orig: Taken part in hotel arrangement before practice and hotel stars assessment of "philharmonic hotel of SCCM".
sent.trans: 曾亲身参与川音爱乐酒店开业前筹备及星级评定工作，熟悉酒店开业前筹备及星级评定程序。

sent.orig: Discovery Park Hotel, Taiyuan, Shanxi Yuyuan Tourist Hotel Group of foreign-owned four-star business hotel.
sent.trans: 太原愉园大酒店是山西愉园旅游饭店集团所属的涉外四星级商务酒店。

sent.orig: Goals, including two attacks in India's most famous five-star hotel-Taj Mahal Hotel and Hotel Aobeiluoyi.
sent.trans: 袭击目标中包括两座印度最著名的五星级饭店--泰姬玛哈饭店和奥贝罗伊饭店。
